ingredients: 4 Tbs. (2 fl. oz./60 ml.) olive oil, plus more as needed
1 1/4 lb. (625 g.) skinless, boneless chicken breasts
2 large red onions, halved, sliced lengthwise
Coarse kosher salt and freshly ground pepper
Coarse kosher salt and freshly ground pepper
8-12 small flour or corn tortillas, about 6 inches (15 cm.) in diameter
1/2 head small savoy cabbage, halved, cored and thinly sliced
1/4 cup (1/3 oz./10 g.) chopped fresh cilantro
1 large avocado, pitted, peeled and sliced
